name: AVCaptureConnection
desc: A connection between a specific pair of capture input and capture output objects in a capture session.

items.name: init(inputPorts: [AVCaptureInput.Port], output: AVCaptureOutput)
items.desc: Initializes a capture connection to describe a connection between the specified input ports and the specified output.

items.name: init(inputPort: AVCaptureInput.Port, videoPreviewLayer: AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer)
items.desc: Initializes a capture connection to describe a connection between the specified input port and the specified video preview layer.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the connection is enabled.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the connection is active.

items.name: var inputPorts: [AVCaptureInput.Port]
items.desc: The connection’s input ports.

items.name: var output: AVCaptureOutput?
items.desc: The connection’s output port.

items.name: var videoPreviewLayer: AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer?
items.desc: The video preview layer associated with the connection.

items.name: var audioChannels: [AVCaptureAudioChannel]
items.desc: An array of AVCaptureAudioChannel objects.

items.name: var videoOrientation: AVCaptureVideoOrientation
items.desc: Indicates whether to rotate the video flowing through the connection to a given orientation.

items.name: var isVideoOrientationSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports changing the orientation of the video.

items.name: enum AVCaptureVideoOrientation
items.desc: Constants indicating video orientation.

items.name: var videoFieldMode: AVVideoFieldMode
items.desc: An indicator of how interlaced video flowing through the connection should be treated

items.name: var isVideoFieldModeSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports setting the videoFieldMode property.

items.name: var videoMinFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The minimum time interval between which the receiver should output consecutive video frames.

items.name: var isVideoMinFrameDurationSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports setting the videoMinFrameDuration property.

items.name: var videoMaxFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The maximum time interval between which the receiver should output consecutive video frames.

items.name: var isVideoMaxFrameDurationSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports setting the videoMaxFrameDuration property.

items.name: var videoScaleAndCropFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: The current video scale and crop factor in use by the receiver.

items.name: var videoMaxScaleAndCropFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum video scale and crop factor by the connection.

items.name: var automaticallyAdjustsVideoMirroring: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the value of isVideoMirrored can change based on configuration of the session.

items.name: var isVideoMirroringSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection supports video mirroring.

items.name: var isVideoMirrored: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the video flowing through the connection should be mirrored about its vertical axis.

items.name: var isVideoStabilizationSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this connection supports video stabilization.

items.name: var activeVideoStabilizationMode: AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode
items.desc: The stabilization mode currently active for the connection.

items.name: var preferredVideoStabilizationMode: AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode
items.desc: The stabilization mode most appropriate for use with the connection.

items.name: var isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliverySupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the capture connection currently supports delivery of camera intrinsics information.

items.name: var isCameraIntrinsicMatrixDeliveryEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to configure the capture pipeline for delivery of camera intrinsics information.

items.name: enum AVCaptureVideoOrientation
items.desc: Constants indicating video orientation.

items.name: enum AVVideoFieldMode
items.desc: Constants indicating video field mode, for use with the videoFieldMode property.
